text: @MSNBC And yet he went golfing again today. Doesn't HE have a little work to do given that 125,000+ Americans died of COVID-19 in the past 4 months? Over 45 million Americans filed for unemployment in the past 14 weeks, but HE's got time for golf? Get to work!
